SELECT id, account_no 'accountNo', name, create_date 'createDate', create_time 'createTime', role_id 'roleId', structure_id 'structureId', storehouse_ids 'storehouseIds', storehouse_own_id 'storehouseOwnId', open_date 'openDate', status, type, phone, phone_user_id 'phoneUserId', shop_phone 'shopPhone', remark, address, open_date 'openDate' FROM user_account
AND id = #{id} AND account_no = #{accountNo} AND name = #{name} AND structure_id = #{structureId} AND status = #{status}

SELECT id, no, name, small_unit smallUnit, big_unit bigUnit, number, status, type, remark, create_date_time createDateTime, isapply isApply, ischeck isCheck, price, boxes_price boxesPrice, form, tax, tax_price taxPrice, deliver_unit deliverUnit, picture_path picturePath, packet, yongyou_id yongyouId FROM shop_b_material_info
AND no = #{no} AND name = #{name} AND status = #{status} AND type = #{type} AND isapply = #{isApply} AND ischeck = #{isCheck} AND yongyou_id = #{yongyouId}

AND inventory_id = #{inventoryId} AND material_id = #{materialId} AND shop_id = #{shopId}

AND shop_id = #{shopId} AND product_id = #{productId}

AND shop_id = #{shopId} AND project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT id, name, type, begin_date 'beginDate', end_date 'endDate', status, is_limit_region 'isLimitRegion', region, is_limit_time 'isLimitTime', is_limit_consume 'isLimitConsume', is_loop 'isLoop', is_message 'isMessage', consume1, consume2, consume3, consume_type1 'consumeType1', consume_type2 'consumeType2', consume_type3 'consumeType3', charge1, charge2, charge3, charge_type1 'chargeType1', charge_type2 'chargeType2', charge_type3 'chargeType3', act_type 'actType', `condition` FROM shop_b_activity_info
